授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to understand  the procedural knowledge to write an academic essay
到達目標: Students will be able to learn how to direct an academic essay into 6 key steps and what each step is.
授業方法: Occasional teacher-centered classes.Mostly students working alone.Some group work.
